entry.title: PhD Defense Completed
entry.summary: I am happy to share that I have successfully defended my PhD thesis, titled “Learning to Guide Automated Reasoning: A GNN-Based Framework.” Defense Details Date: 6 May 2025 Time: 13:15 Location: Room 10132 Häggsalen, Ångström Opponent: Prof. Stephan Schulz, DHBW Stuttgart, Germany Supervisor: Prof. Philipp Rümmer, Uppsala University, Sweden Chair: Prof. Bengt Jonsson, Uppsal...
